articles.author: Beatrice Nolan
articles.title: Anthropic launches Claude Cowork, a file-managing AI agent that could threaten dozens of startups - Fortune
articles.description: The new tool brings Claude Code's capabilities to non-technical users, positioning Anthropic to compete with productivity tools like Microsoft Copilot.
articles.content: Anthropic has launched Claude Cowork, a general-purpose AI agent that can manipulate, read, and analyze files on a users computer, as well as create new files. The tool is currently available as a re… [+3646 chars]
